description:
Zoning rules for districts. A= Allowed  C=Conditional F = Forbidden
Please use attached document for sub district ID locations and to join to shape file located here: http://boston.maps.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=58348dd9d09442ee91ca9d2dcb527ba4
